subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Celtics’ Rajon Rondo scored 44 points to lead all players, but the Heat still got the victory behind LeBron James’s 34 points and Dwyane Wade’s 23 points.
snippet: The Celtics’ Rajon Rondo scored 44 points to lead all players, but the Heat still got the victory behind LeBron James’s 34 points and Dwyane Wade’s 23 points.
